full_summary:
### **ET025-250284: Construction of New Pesticide and Chemicals Storage Buildings**

#### **Notification Details**

* **Reference Number**: WS4639707913-Doc4639765705
* **Date and Time of Tender Closing**: July 16th, 2024 at 14:00
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)
* **Method of Award**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Primary Contact**: Alex Tikhonovitch, SPAC/PSPC (billical@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### **Project Description**

This contract involves the demolition of existing pesticide and chemical storage buildings (205.42 m² and 41.29 m² respectively) at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Morden Research and Development Centre in Morden, Manitoba. Asbestos abatement and lead paint remediation will be required prior to demolition. New construction of a pesticide storage building (201 m²) and a separate chemical storage building (50.5 m²) will also be undertaken.

#### **Contract Scope and Evaluation Criteria**

The tendering process is divided into two stages. Stage One will evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers. Outcome of Stage One will determine eligibility to proceed to Stage Two, in which qualified suppliers will be invited to submit a bid package inclusive of a financial proposal based on the project specifications and drawings.

#### **Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity**

This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Opportunities for regional economic growth are anticipated in Manitoba.

#### **Notes**

Please be advised that the tender has expired and will not be extended. Ensure that all interested bidders submit their expressions of qualifications as per the published time frame. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) can be reached for any inquiries or clarification regarding the proposed project.

#### **Additional Details**

* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 17th, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 17th, 2025
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20041474?extsite=MjAwNDE0NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg
